snippet.title: CGI Animated Short Film: "Don't Croak" by Daun Kim | CGMeetup
snippet.description:
CGI 3D Animated Short Film: Don't Croak Animated Short Film by  Daun Kim at Ringling College of Art and Design. Featured on CGMeetup https://www.cgmeetup.com/project/cgi-3d-animated-short-film-don-t-croak-by-daun-kim 

Don’t Croak is an emotional thriller about a frog escaping a determined, frenzied girl in a middle school science lab to avoid dissection. Produced at Ringling College of Art and Design 
Director: Daun Kim https://www.cgmeetup.com/dkim
Instagram: @daunkim.art 
Official Vimeo: www.vimeo.com/daunkim/dontcroak
Music by Kevin Smithers
Sound Design by Dione Tan
https://www.ringling.edu/

SUBSCRIBE to CGMeetup for more inspiring content! http://bit.ly/Sub2CGMeetup
Watch More CGI & VFX Animated Short Films: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLc6NCp8iAPDa4dBRHY4E5uvuqNcYe8AXX
VFX Breakdowns, Making of & Behind the Scene: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLc6NCp8iAPDYMZcYBcEBQRoGidvdi0iPN 

FOLLOW US:
Website: http://www.cgmeetup.com
YouTube https://www.youtube.com/user/CGMeetUp
Facebook https://www.facebook.com/CGMeetup
Twitter https://twitter.com/cgmeetup
Google+ https://plus.google.com/+Cgmeetup
Dailymotion http://www.dailymotion.com/user/CGMeetup
Pinterest https://www.pinterest.com/cgmeetup/
Instagram https://instagram.com/cgmeetup/

WANT TO GET FEATURED?
All CGI artists, studios or schools who would like their work featured or
published on CGMeetup please apply below. We’re looking for short films, commercial spots, breakdowns, showreels etc.
Submit here → https://www.cgmeetup.com/gallery
Contact us here → info@cgmeetup.com or info@cgmeetup.net

Please Note: All videos are uploaded after written copyright permission from respected Artists, Studios or Schools Or part of the Creative Commons license.
https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/legalcode
For more details or to dispute please contact us at info@cgmeetup.com or info@cgmeetup.net

ABOUT CGMeetup:
CGMeetup is the #1 inspiration resource for all CGI, VFX, 3D and Digital artists. We feature a wide variety of CGI content including behind-the-
scenes, vfx breakdowns, short films & showreels.

CGMeetup also serves as networking resource for CGI Professionals.
Professionals use CGMeetup to exchange ideas, knowledge & job
opportunities.

CGI Animated Short Film: "Don't Croak" by Daun Kim | CGMeetup 
https://youtu.be/j8PDTJNaPc0 

CGMeetup
https://www.youtube.com/CGMeetup

snippet.title: The Egyptian Pyramids - Funny Animated Short Film
snippet.description:
Cairo, 1920, an archaeologist is about to discover the secret of the Egyptian Pyramids...

Directed by :
Corentin Charron, Lise Corriol, Olivier Lafay, Nicolas Mrikhi

Music by :
Kalina Świątnicka


http://www.onectin.fr 
http://www.nicojak.com
http://www.lafayolivier.com
http://lisecorriol.wix.com/lise

We are the original creators of this film. Made in Supinfocom Arles (MOPA) for the MuCEM museum in 2013.

snippet.title: Whats your favorite color? #shorts
snippet.description:
Well, that escalated quickly...

﻿Stream One Tree Hill on Max.

About Max:
Max is the culture-defining entertainment service for every mood. With a variety of genres that include your favorite series and movies from iconic brands and treasured franchises, it delivers irresistible stories every time. From reuniting with life-long favorites to uncovering new ones you haven’t discovered yet, there's something for every moment, every feeling, every you.

It’s all here. Iconic series, award-winning movies, fresh originals, and family favorites featuring the worlds of Harry Potter, the DC Universe, and HBO. Discover the best entertainment for every mood. Introducing Max – the one to watch.

CGI 3D Animated Short Film: In Love Animated Short Film by Super Dope. Featured on CGMeetup https://www.cgmeetup.com/gallery

I scream. You scream. We all scream for ICE CREAM!
Here's to the end of this super weird summer.

Created & Directed by Super Dope https://www.super-dope.tv/
Animation: Thomas Shek, Michael Sime 
Rigging: Daniela Dwek
Sound Design: Gavin Slyman

SUBSCRIBE to CGMeetup for more inspiring content! http://bit.ly/Sub2CGMeetup

snippet.title: Bent Out of Shape | Official Animated Short Film
snippet.description:
The 3D animated short film, "Bent Out of Shape" follows the story of a dull, square woman and her child living in a dull, square world. However, when a bright, circular neighbor moves in next door,  the square woman begins to feel that her lifestyle is being threatened. Even worse, she worries that her square child may be affected by the circular neighbor's influence...

This short film was completed over the course of a couple of years, and created entirely by Chloe Merwin as a senior thesis project in the Computer Animation program at Ringling College of Art and Design.

Copyright 2023 Chloe Merwin & Ringling College of Art and Design
tags: bent out of shape short film

Production                      KAZZAZ FILMS
Main Actor                      GUILLAUME SOUBEYRAN
DOP                                  LUDOVIC MATTHEY

snippet.title: Cruella (2021) | The rebel kid with runway hair.💃🖤🤍 #edit
snippet.description:
At school, little Estella is already a hurricane in pigtails. 🎒💨
While the other kids line up quietly, she struts in like the runway is hers. 💃✨ Teachers gasp, bullies whisper, but Estella? She’s busy redesigning the uniform with a pair of scissors. ✂️👗

Rules? Optional. Authority? Negotiable. 😏👑
She paints the lockers, argues with the headmistress, and somehow manages to make detention look like an art gallery opening. 🎨🚪

But behind the sass and the smirk, there’s a spark — the kind that says: “One day, I’ll run this world… in black and white.” 🖤🤍🐾
Cruella isn’t born evil. She’s born fabulous… and maybe just a tiny bit dangerous. 😉🔥
#movie #shorts

snippet.title: savage 😂 #funny #shorts #movies #explore #fashionstyle #reels #hilarious #costume #aura #prank
snippet.description: Role Models (2008) is a comedy about two energy drink salesmen, Danny (Paul Rudd) and Wheeler (Seann William Scott), who end up in trouble with the law. Instead of going to jail, they’re forced to do community service in a “Big Brother” style mentorship program, looking after kids who are total misfits. Danny is paired with Augie, a socially awkward teen obsessed with medieval role-playing, while Wheeler is stuck with Ronnie, a foul-mouthed troublemaker. At first, both men are terrible role models, but over time they bond with the kids, learn responsibility, and find a sense of purpose. The film mixes raunchy humour with heart, showing that unlikely people can still make a positive difference.

localized.title: savage 😂 #funny #shorts #movies #explore #fashionstyle #reels #hilarious #costume #aura #prank
localized.description: Role Models (2008) is a comedy about two energy drink salesmen, Danny (Paul Rudd) and Wheeler (Seann William Scott), who end up in trouble with the law. Instead of going to jail, they’re forced to do community service in a “Big Brother” style mentorship program, looking after kids who are total misfits. Danny is paired with Augie, a socially awkward teen obsessed with medieval role-playing, while Wheeler is stuck with Ronnie, a foul-mouthed troublemaker. At first, both men are terrible role models, but over time they bond with the kids, learn responsibility, and find a sense of purpose. The film mixes raunchy humour with heart, showing that unlikely people can still make a positive difference.

snippet.title: CGI Animated Short Film: "Mr Indifferent" by Aryasb Feiz | CGMeetup
snippet.description:
CGI 3D Animated Short Film: Mr Indifferent Animated Short Film by Aryasb Feiz. Featured on CGMeetup https://www.cgmeetup.com/

"Mr Indifferent" is our latest short film for Emirates NBD Bank.
A film by: Aryasb Feiz 
Production company: Hanzo FZE
Agency: Leo Burnett, Dubai

As we celebrate World Kindness Day on 13th November, let’s take time to reflect on how we can make a difference.
